creatures.title: Forest Leaper
creatures.description: These ambush predators lie in wait during the night. The soft and stiff hairs on the upper and lower abdomen help to feel the vibrations of prey in the pitch black of the forest. Its powerful hind legs can propel this creature up to 50m. For my 1v1 w/Mavor

comments.commit: A force before there were those to bring force upon, a god when the Earth was godless and un-formed. Unthinking and inerrable as the constants of the natural world are, Khet was Fire and Movement and Collision, unstoppable as Fate itself.

creatures.title: Desol Dragon
creatures.description: This is actually a bit basic. The head and neck are the only exiteing parts. Try putting heycorns on the end of reptilian tails.Worthy of feature! Love dragons. This one looks great. The detail and colors are spot-on. Check out my creature if you'd like some inspiration on tail-endings.

creatures.title: RECRUIT
creatures.description: The Infernal King, He who basks in the Fires of the Origin. Before there were races to claim his rule a tyranny on the Earth, before there were minds to comprehend itâ€™s immaculate form, Khet was the mindless ruler. A force before there were those to bring force upon, a god when the Earth was godless and un-formed. Unthinking and inerrable as the constants of the natural world are, Khet was Fire and Movement and Collision, unstoppable as Fate itself. Its whims held no reason, its machinations clean of insight such as the New Gods would come to possess. Only for the greater Force of Change, the Unspoken Cromm, were his purposes doused, and his ceaseless form subdued by a greying World.

comments.commit: A force before there were those to bring force upon, a god when the Earth was godless and un-formed. Unthinking and inerrable as the constants of the natural world are, Khet was Fire and Movement and Collision, unstoppable as Fate itself.

creatures.title: Zremagian
creatures.description: These catlike predators use spatial illusions to disorient their prey. With 6 legs and two long tentacles, they are strong, fast, and vicious. This particular variation is native to Zremagia and greatly feared by the natives.

creatures.title: Dark Lung
creatures.description: Nice use of limbs and Cornutopias! Nice coloring, too. R+! Try experimenting with limbs more - I can see this thing looking much more alien with a few tendrils/spined appendages!

creatures.title: Oceous
creatures.description: When we passed the last solar system on our way home with our UHDT-1 armored shuttle, we saw that adolescent Oceous life form on a type and brought it on board of our shuttle for further research. UHDT-1 armored shuttle:

creatures.title: Dread Glognarr
creatures.description: Thanks, Maxis, for the feature! I'm very greatful for this! Featured - 2/2/11.] Something I put together for the contest; an example, I should say. If you have nothing interesting to do, join my contest(s)! Created by Buddydestruction.

creatures.title: HEYCORN BABY
creatures.description: Thanks, Maxis, for the feature! I'm very greatful for this! Featured - 2/2/11.] Something I put together for the contest; an example, I should say. If you have nothing interesting to do, join my contest(s)! Created by Buddydestruction.

creatures.title: Snow Fox
creatures.description: These catlike predators use spatial illusions to disorient their prey. With 6 legs and two long tentacles, they are strong, fast, and vicious. This particular variation is native to Zremagia and greatly feared by the natives.

creatures.title: Khaorm Queen
creatures.description: The massive queen of the Khaorm only wakes once in a millenia. Armies of drones must bring thousands of slaves to feed these massive queens, forcing the Khaorm to the surface to hunt. No surface creature has seen a Queen and lived.

creatures.title: Dominiric
creatures.description: To be fair, I did perceive something big was to happen for this titanic omnivore. Plus, "Dominiric" is a pretty cool name.

creatures.title: Tyrath
creatures.description: R+ for this creation and an R+ for you being nice to me, commenting on my things and making the coolest creations!!!

creatures.title: Sapphire
creatures.description: A gift to my 1300+ subscribers! Being on Spore for only little over a year, I am overwhelmed by how many of you left comments, gave gifts and inspired me to keep creating! I truly could not ask for a more awesome community! I hope this beasty is ample thanks to each and every one of ya! On a slightly sadder note, these coming summer months are likely the last I'll be able to keep creating on Spore. I'm starting college in August and looking ahead to a fun but very busy education in game design and animation...so who knows, ya might see me again sometime in a different game ;D I'll still be here up untill the latter days of July, and if I'm lucky I might get a creation published every once in a while during the schoolyear. I don't want to completely abandon this game, so I will sincerely try to be active as much as time and studying allows. You all have made this year an amazing one, and I hope I get to stay around for as long as possible. Thank you all very much
